description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1jmt6","text":"This protocol details the cryosectioning of mouse brain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aj4pv","text":"Place the mouse brain in the mouse brain slicer ( ). Cut the hinder of the brain and put it in 4% PFA   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":102,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":107,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3339o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5CC2EF40CE4011EB86F7134BF74305A1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"6361BA70CE4011EB86F7134BF74305A1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"664C5740CE4011EB86F7134BF74305A1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5p769","text":"Change the solution to 30% sucrose/PBS at   until the brain sinks in the bottom ( ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8joqm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"77E97730CE4011EB86F7134BF74305A1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"7A2B29D0CE4011EB86F7134BF74305A1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ie53","text":"Change the solution to 60% sucrose/PBS at   for  -  (optional).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4r8i7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"88C73EC0CE4011EB86F7134BF74305A1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"A25DB0D0CE4011EB86F7134BF74305A1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":432000,"guid":"B37F3820CE4011EB86F7134BF74305A1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ds0b3","text":"Cut 1/2 to 2/3 of the cerebellum to make a flat seat.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4c4fh","text":"Cut the pieces of foil for the tissue wrapping and label the pieces with chemical resistant marker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42o76","text":"Place a small beaker containing 2/3 2-methylbutane, at least half buried in dry ice. Allow it to cool enough (when you see it turn white and thick at the bottom of the container).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aifi8","text":"Gently place the mouse brain into 2-methylbutane and allow it to sit for a while until it no longer “smoking” (~ ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":112,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1i9au","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":20,"guid":"D4FFBA10CE4011EB86F7134BF74305A1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6h2lm","text":"Place a layer of OCT on the foil on dry ice. Wait a few seconds until OCT turns to half opaque.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"72vcv","text":"Place the brain on the layer of OCT and place another layer of OCT to cover the brain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c371f","text":"Wrap the brain with the labeled foil and store the brain at   until sectioning.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e5qbd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E5294CD0CE4011EB86F7134BF74305A1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b8fu3","text":"Place the brains in cryostat when it reaches   for half hour to allow the temperature balanced.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cs4j6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"052EA070CE4111EB86F7134BF74305A1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-22","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5iukf","text":"In 12-wells plate, add   cryo-protective solution (30% Glycerol, 30% Ethylene Glycol in PBS) per well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"21l6p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"0B5E7D30CE4111EB86F7134BF74305A1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2t974","text":"For stereological dopaminergic neurons counting, start to collect the sections when it close to substantial nigral (midbrain is apple-ish like shape. Hippocampus spread to 2/3 of the cortex). Collect ~10-12 sections per well. Store plates at   until staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":242,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ajdig","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"lfvm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"514vm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1B3F6E30CE4111EB86F7134BF74305A1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4lofn","text":"
